name: Slaughter Cannon 2
description:
Slaughter Cannon - Continuation of the first part of an exciting physical puzzle! In the game you will find even more exciting and exciting levels of varying difficulty.
Immerse yourself in the medieval atmosphere and take control of a killer cannon and destroy everything in your path!
There are many unique buildings and levels waiting for you in the game, so go through them all!

Game Features:
- Lots of levels
- Complete destruction of objects
- Physics
- Colorful graphics
